channel.title: Milk on My cyberpage
channel.description: Recent content in Milk on My cyberpage

item.title: Milk Programming Language
item.description: Over the past year I have been delving deeper into programming languages. In my journey so far I have created a few languages based on Lox and Monkey. And I am now at a point where I want to create my first “serious” toy language. A language for me to learn more concepts and try out different approaches.
